images.copyright: Arctic fox sleeping (© Chansak Joe/Getty Images)
images.title: Stretch into the New Year
images.caption: Happy New Year!
images.desc: Do you feel as if you have a whole year's worth of rest to catch up on? Then you can relate to this Arctic fox, cozily tucked among the rocky outcroppings of the frozen tundra. Whether the new year greets you with biting cold or under a warm sun, take five extra minutes to stretch before diving into the 365 days ahead.

tooltips.walle: This image is not available to download as wallpaper.
tooltips.walls: Download this image. Use of this image is restricted to wallpaper only.
